origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'NetEaseAPI.analyze_tech_innovation', 'description': 'This function analyzes the technology innovation capability of a specified company based on its technology development expenses and revenue.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the company, e.g., NetEase.'}, {'name': 'expenses', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The total technology development expenses.'}, {'name': 'revenue', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The total revenue generated from technology development.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'innovation_score', 'description': 'The score representing the company's technology innovation capability.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 NetEaseAPI.analyze_tech_innovation, 它的参数输入如下: 'company'是'NetEase', 'expenses'是'120000000', 'revenue'是'350000000'.
